name: Welcome Home (Ninfar)
description:
It's Halloween and you just got home. But something's horribly wrong. There, in the dark silent hallway, behind the door frame... A face, smiling from ear to ear, stares unblinkingly at you. 

Do NOT look at it.

WARNING: Contains flashing lights (the flashlight can flicker) and jump scares (although they're mostly not scripted. Just a matter of looking somewhere at the wrong time)

I hope you enjoy!~ This was my first attempt at 3D with the Godot engine. Although the game is still in development, it's close to being finished. I still plan on fleshing out the ending, adding some QoL stuff, some polish, improving the audio and possibly more!

The Linux released hasn't been tested yet, so if you encounter any game breaking issues, feel free to let me know in the comments.

CONTROLS:

WASD to walk

MOUSE to look around

E to interact

CTRL to crouch

SHIFT to run
